title: Table 166 - Row 3
clause_text: 4.: 6. | Are all plans as required under Regulation No.2.2 enclosed ?: (a) Is road available as an approach to the land ? What is the average existing width of the road ? (If the plot abuts on two or more roads, the above information in respect of all roads should be given) | Yes / No: Yes / No Existing Width -----------

headers: Are all plans as required under Regulation No.2.2 enclosed ?
values: (a) Is road available as an approach to the land ? What is the average existing width of the road ? (If the plot abuts on two or more roads, the above information in respect of all roads should be given)
